Source code for itv_asset_tree.core.tree_manager

# src/managers/tree_manager.py

from abc import ABC, abstractmethod



[docs]
class TreeManager(ABC):
    """
    Abstract base class for managing asset trees in Seeq.
    
    This class defines a blueprint for constructing and clearing asset trees within a specified workbook.
    """

    def __init__(self, workbook: str):
        """
        Initializes the TreeManager with a specified workbook.

        Args:
            workbook (str): The name of the workbook containing the asset tree.
        """
        self.workbook = workbook
        self.tree = None



[docs]
    @abstractmethod
    def build_tree(self, friendly_name: str, description: str):
        """
        Constructs a new tree with the specified name and description.

        Args:
            friendly_name (str): The display name of the tree.
            description (str): A description of the tree.
        """
        pass





[docs]
    @abstractmethod
    def clear_existing_tree(self, tree_name: str):
        """
        Clears an existing tree by its name, removing it from the workbook.

        Args:
            tree_name (str): The name of the tree to be cleared.
        """
        pass
